Scroll down on a scrollable area that has text "COLOR CUSTOMIZATION, Customize colors, Customize widget colors[...and more]"
Touch on a checked checkbox that has text "Move items into the Recycle Bin instead of deletin[...]"

column3: rename the first audio to 'voice.m4a'
column8:
Touch on a button that has text "Player"
Long touch on a button that has text "2025_08_07_13_53_37.m4a, 00:02, 07.08.2025, 01:53 PM[...and more]"
Touch on a button that has content_desc "Rename"
Fill a focused textfield that has text "2025_08_07_13_53_37" with "voice.m4a"
Touch on a button that has text "OK"

column3: rename all audio to voice1.m4a, voice2.m4a, and so on
column8:
Touch on a button that has text "Player"
Long touch on a button that has text "2025_08_07_14_04_07.m4a, 00:02, 07.08.2025, 02:04 PM[...and more]"
Touch on a button that has content_desc "Rename"
Fill a focused textfield that has text "2025_08_07_14_04_07" with "voice1.m4a"
Touch on a button that has text "OK"
Long touch on a button that has text "2025_08_07_14_04_05.m4a, 00:02, 07.08.2025, 02:04 PM[...and more]"
Touch on a button that has content_desc "Rename"
Fill a focused textfield that has text "2025_08_07_14_04_05" with "voice2.m4a"
Touch on a button that has text "OK"
Long touch on a button that has text "2025_08_07_14_04_03.m4a, 00:02, 07.08.2025, 02:04 PM[...and more]"
Touch on a button that has content_desc "Rename"

column3: change app theme to dark red
column8:
Touch on a button that has content_desc "Settings"
Touch on a button that has text "Customize colors"
Touch on a button that has text "Theme, Dark"
Touch on a button that has text "OK"
Touch on a button that has text "Dark red"
Touch on a button that has text "Save"
